body: And they lived happily ever after...
I agree with Pvt_Hairball, really wish there was more porn with an actual story and drama. This story is really well written. :)

This is actually one of my favourite hentai one-shots of all time. It doesn't have the best drawing in the world, and the sex itself isn't anything new.

But the storytelling is pretty good. I like that there is an actual drama happening here. The strange sexual dynamics. And I very much appreciated the twist at the end.

There's something you don't see as common in porn: thoughtful storytelling
